main event: UFO observed by crew of a C-45 aircraft at Norton AFB while flying at 68 feet altitude.
interesting points: Sighting lasted for seven minutes with the object heading 180 degrees., The object appeared bright red at the leading portion and bright white light at the trailing portion., Observers considered very reliable, included a pilot, a co-pilot, and an observer., No sound was audible during the sighting and no exhaust or trail was observed., No photographs were taken during the encounter.
sighted object: unidentified flying object that climbed rapidly and disappeared
witness description: pilot Joseph P. Tracy, co-pilot Capt. John H. Moore, and observer 1st Lt. Raymond J. German
